article.title: QinetiQ North America Wins $206 Million Space and Naval Warfare Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: QinetiQ North America has been awarded a $206 million, multiple-award, indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract to provide life cycle support services to the Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center, San Diego's command, control, communications, computers, intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance programs in Philadelphia.
